name: AddStars
author: AddStars

sections.description:
Description

The AddStars Review plugin can only be used with the AddStars code snippet generated from your Addstars Dashboard at AddStars or Addstars Dashboard

This simple plugin lets you insert your code snippet into the of your WordPress website with no need to edit or modify your theme files.

Features of the AddStar Review Plugin

 Very lightweight
 Quick to setup
 Simple to insert the AddStars script
 Insert code snippet into
 Features “defer” in the script to load last

Credits:

Created by the AddStars Development team.
Adapted from the “Insert Headers and Footers” plugin by WPBeginner

Notes:

Our goal is to collect your reviews from multiple review platforms and display them as golden stars beneath your search page results on Google.
sections.faq:
FAQ’s:

Q1. Can I use AddStars review plugin to add any script to my WordPress website?
A1. No, only the Code snippet from the AddStars dashboard can be used with this plugin. Any other script or code may break your site.
Q2. How do I get support.
A2. Once you are logged into your dashboard, use the chat feature which can also raise a ticket.

short_description: This Plugin allows you to add your AddStars code snippet into the header of your website so that your reviews can show on Googles search results.
